threepio.tagHandler
Class TagHandler

java.lang.Object
  threepio.tagHandler.TagHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
DescriptionHandler, GeneralTagHandler, HyperlinkHandler, SyntaxHandler
public abstract class TagHandler
extends java.lang.Object

TagHandler is an abstract class with some common elements of classes for handling XML tags.

Author:
jhoule

Constructor Detail

TagHandler

public TagHandler()
Method Detail

getTypeHandled

public abstract java.lang.String getTypeHandled()
returns the string of the item type in the XML that this handler is for. it is required to return a valid String for all TagHandlers in order to make the HandlerFactory work correctly.

Returns:
the type this handler handles.

getFriendlyName

public abstract java.lang.String getFriendlyName()
returns the string that should be used when labeling the results of this tag parser.

Returns:
the "label" for the Tag's results.

handle

public abstract void handle(Doc doc,
                            Doc before,
                            XTag tag,
                            IndexedHashMap columns,
                            Row row,
                            int where)
handle (XDoc) handles the document, popping the parts it parses. what is left of the document is what is after the closing tag of the part the handler was to parse.

Parameters:
doc - - the document to handle.
before - - the parts of the document that occurred before the Tag.
tag - - the tag to handle.
columns - - a map of the columns required in a table.
row - - the row where the tag to handle shows up.
where - - the index of the cell in which to put the result of the handling of the tag.
